description:
This course is designed to help people in the Philippines connect with US companies that are looking to hire. We will discuss recent changes in the global business environment and technology platforms you can use to find the right US companies. After using these strategies myself and hiring numerous workers from around the world, this is a great summary of the most common mistakes I have seen as well as the strategies to help you more effectively reach your goal of working with US companies. We will even discuss interview preparation, interview skills and important technology considerations. 

At the end of this course, students will be able to:

  • Effectively find and post for jobs in the United States

  • Write their online and social profiles in order to get more interview requests

  • Present themselves well in an interviews with US companies
title: Philippines: How to get hired in the United States
